name: Welcome Visitor
author: Chen Ju

sections.description:
Welcome-visitor is a wordpress plugin, which will welcome visitors ( who come from others sites, e.g. google search, yahoo! serach or your friends’ links), and ask them to bookmark your site or to subscribe your rss feed. It will help you to get more readers and more attention!

visitorPlugin Home for further information!

more wordpress plugins are on the way from Chen Ju
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download the plugin
  2. Unachive it
  3. Upload to wp-content/plugins/
  4. Login to plugin page and activate it
  5. If you want to change the default settings, go to settings page,and choose menu Welcome Visitor.
sections.faq:
Is it necessary to have a Frequently Asked Questions

I don’t think so 🙂

visitorPlugin Home for further information!

• 0.9 2008/7/27 first version
  • 0.91 2008/7/28 0.9version will cause an error in Dashboard->incoming links area. It was fixed in 0.91
  • 0.92 2008/7/30 fix some bugs
  • 0.93 2008/7/31 fix a serious bug, add a small feed img
  • 1.00 2008/8/1 now you can custome your own welcome words. 🙂
